name: Solstice Stones
description: Once upon a time, in a world beyond our own, lived a young child who found themselves lost in a land of giants. With no memory of how they arrived in this strange place the only lead they had was in a recurring dream about an island and five different crystal chunks. In order to find those crystals, the child embarked on a perilous journey which lead to mysterious dungeon floating in the middle of the ocean, filled with strange devices and enigmas. Now the only way to find the answers they needed, was to rely on their wits and ingenuity. Will they succeed and overcome all adversities? Only time will tell
